# System

## Continuous

| CONTINUOUS MODE       | Available frame advance rates (JPEG) |
|-----------------------|--------------------------------------|
| 30fps (1.25X CROP)Â¹   | 30                                   |
| 20fps (1.25X CROP)Â¹   | 20                                   |
| 10fps (1.25X CROP)Â¹   | 10                                   |
| 20fpsÂ¹                | 20                                   |
| 11fpsÂ²                | 11                                   |
| 10fpsÂ¹                | 10                                   |

Â¹ Available with electronic shutter only.  
Â² 10 fps with electronic shutter.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The frame rate and number of frames per burst varies with shooting conditions and type of memory card used.

## Focus

- **Mode:** Single or continuous AF; manual focus with focus ring
- **Autofocus system:** Intelligent hybrid AF (TTL contrast-detect/phase-detection AF) with AF-assist illuminator
- **Focus-area selection:** SINGLE POINT, ZONE, WIDE/TRACKING, ALL

## White Balance

Auto, Custom 1, Custom 2, Custom 3, color temperature selection, direct sunlight, shade, daylight fluorescent, warm white fluorescent, cool white fluorescent, incandescent, underwater

## Self-timer

Off, 2 sec., 10 sec.

## Flash

- **Type:** Auto flash
- **Effective range (ISO 1600):** Approx. 0.3 m â€“ 7.4 m / 1.0 ft. â€“ 24 ft.
